title: 1.28 Modern Debates: Judging Joshua and the Judges
itunes:title: Modern Debates: Judging Joshua and the Judges
description: In the 1970s, scholars demolished the credibility of the Biblical stories of the patriarchs. In the decades following, archaeologists threw out the Biblical history of Joshua and Judges. I present the current theories on the origins of the Israelites.
content:encoded: In the 1970s, scholars demolished the credibility of the Biblical stories of the patriarchs. In the decades following, archaeologists threw out the Biblical history of Joshua and Judges. I present the current theories on the origins of the Israelites.
itunes:subtitle: Joshua and Judges don't hold up. So what are the real origins of Israelites?
